item.title: FFAR
item.description: Still viable FFAR. Item Attachment Muzzle Suppressor Laser Tiger Team Spotlight Stock Raider Stock Rear Grip Serpent Wrap Ammunition STANAG 50 Rnd I’ve never tried this setup, but it seems interesting. Looks like a loadout that favors shorter range, but would probably rip.

item.title: GRAU
item.description: Probably the best gun to have a fully loaded class for endgame. Item Attachment Muzzle Monolithic Suppressor Barrel Tempus 26.4" Archangel Underbarrel Commando Foregrip Ammunition 60 Round Mags Perk Fully Loaded If you just want a regular GRAU, swap Fully Loaded for a Tac Laser.

item.title: XM4
item.description: I put this in for Kevin. I don’t expect anyone to use it lol. Long range build. Item Attachment Muzzle Agency Suppressor Barrel 13.5" Task Force Optic Axial Arms 3x Ammunition STANAG 60 Rnd Underbarrel Field Agent Grip Close range build. Item Attachment Muzzle Agency Suppressor Laser Tiger Team Spotlight Stock Raider Pad Ammunition 45 Rnd Rear Grip Airborne Elastic Wrap Alternative: JGOD has Microflex LED Optic swapped in for Tiger Team Spotlight.

item.title: Swiss BR
item.description: Supposedly it’s gaining on the KAR. Item Attachment Muzzle GRU Suppressor Barrel 24.9" Combat Recon Laser SWAT 5mw Laser Sight Underbarrel Bruiser Grip Rear Grip Serpent Grip

item.title: Krig
item.description: Underrated. Conor and Steb can vouch. Item Attachment Muzzle Agency Suppressor Barrel 15" CMV Mil-Spec Optic Axial Arms 3x Rear Grip Airbborne Elastic Wrap Ammunition STANAG 60 Rnd Alternative: Better recoil control with 15" Mil Spec Barrel. Swap to 19" Ranger for quicker ADS but tougher recoil.

item.title: MP5
item.description: Modern Warefare MP5. Supposedly not as good as the Cold War, but it’s good right now. Item Attachment Barrel Monolithic Integral Suppressor Underbarrel Merc Foregrip Stock FTAC Collapsable Ammunition 45 Round Mags Perk Slight of Hand

item.title: RAM7
item.description: Ramm it in. Item Attachment Muzzle Monolithic Suppressor Barrel FSS Ranger Optic VLK 3.0x Optic Underbarrel Commando Foregrip Ammunition 50 Round Mags

item.title: ZRG
item.description: Long Range sniper. Item Attachment Muzzle Wrapped Suppressor Barrel 43.9" Combat Recon Laser SWAT 5mw Laser Sight Ammunition 5 Rnd Rear Grip Airborne Elastic Wrap

item.title: LC10
item.description: LC10 is actually a longer range SMG. Works well paired with a sniper like the KAR. Item Attachment Muzzle Agency Suppressor Barrel 13.9" Task Force Laser Tiger Team Spotlight Stock Raider Stock Ammunition STANAG 55 RND

item.title: KAR98
item.description: Aggressive sniper. Item Attachment Muzzle Monolithic Suppressor Barrel Singuard Custom 27 6" Laser Tac Laser Optic Sniper Scope Stock STVOL Precision Comb Depending how pro you are there are a few options. If you’re good with your aim, swap the STVOL Precision for the FTAC Sport Comb for quicker ADS. If you’re less pro like the Steb, you can swap the stock out entirely for the Focus Perk for steady aim.

item.title: MAC10
item.description: Will always be the best, even when it isn’t. Item Attachment Muzzle Agency Suppressor Barrel 5.9" Task Force Laser Tiger Team Spotlight Stock Raider Stock Ammunition STANAG 55 RND Drum

item.title: FARA
item.description: Still good for now. Item Attachment Muzzle GRU Suppressor Barrel 18.7" Spetsnaz RPK Barrel Optic Axial Arms 3x Underbarrel Spetsnaz Grip Ammunition Spetsnaz 60 Rnd If you’re good and don’t need recoil control help, you can swap the Spetsnaz Grip for a GRU Elastic Wrap on the Rear Grip for quicker ADS.

item.title: MP5 CW
item.description: Black Ops MP5. Item Attachment Muzzle Agency Suppressor Laser Tiger Team Spotlight Underbarrel Bruiser Grip Stock Raider Stock Ammunition STANAG 50 RND Drum

item.title: C58
item.description: Probably sucks, but they say it’s good. Item Attachment Muzzle Agency Suppressor Barrel 18.5" Task Force Optic Axial Arms 3x Underbarrel Field Agent Grip Ammunition STANAG 55 Rnd Alternative: Swap the Field Agent Grip for the Airborne Elastic Wrap Rear Grip for quicker ADS, but more recoil.

item.title: Milano
item.description: Pizza Milano special delivery. IceManIssac Build Item Attachment Muzzle Agency Suppressor Barrel 10.6" Task Force Optic Microflex LED Stock Raider Stock Ammunition STANAG 55 RND Drum JGOD Build Item Attachment Muzzle Agency Suppressor Barrel 10.5" Ranger Optic Axial Arms 3x Underbarrel Field Agent Grip Ammunition STANAG 55 Rnd Drum Yes that’s correct, he has a 3x scope.

item.title: CR-56 AMAX
item.description: Nikoba’s favorite gun. Item Attachment Muzzle Monolithic Suppressor Barrel XRK Zodiac S440 Optic VLK 3.0x Optic Underbarrel Commando Foregrip Ammunition 45 Round Mags

item.title: AK (CW)
item.description: The real feel AK, from Cold War. IceManIssac Sniper Support Build Item Attachment Muzzle GRU Suppressor Barrel 20" Spetsnaz RPK Barrel Optic Microflex LED Stock KGB Skeletal Stock Ammunition 45 Rnd JGOD Sniper Support Build Item Attachment Muzzle GRU Suppressor Optic Microflex LED Stock KGB Skeletal Stock Ammunition 45 Rnd Rear Grip GRU Elastic Wrap Long Range: Item Attachment Muzzle GRU Suppressor Barrel 20" Spetsnaz RPK Barrel Optic Axial Arms 3x Underbarrel Spetsnaz Grip Ammunition 45 Rnd Alternative: Some were swapping the GRU Suppressor for a regular suppressor right now.

item.title: Stoner 63
item.description: Stoner 63 AR Build Item Attachment Muzzle Agency Suppressor Barrel 21.8" Task Force Optic Royal & Kross 4x Underbarrel Field Agent Grip Rear Grip Airborne Elastic Wrap Alternative: Swap Field Agent Grip for Fast Mag in Ammunition for faster reload. Pairs well with: Milano
